content:
Also, the ecological threats to unicorns and a global hotpot battle

JOKO WIDODO, Indonesia’s president, is expected to win re-election in today’s vote, after a people-pleasing first term spent improving the country’s infrastructure. But there are worrying signs about how “Jokowi” might continue to rule. As a herd of “unicorns” head toward their IPOs, their business models are looking less sure-footed. And a battle is heating up as hotpot, a spicy Chinese dish, spreads globally. Runtime: 22 min.

Listen on: Apple Podcasts  |  Spotify  |  Google  |  Stitcher  |  TuneIn

ex: n. 印度尼西亚；【国】印度尼西亚；印度尼西亚共和国
网络 印尼；雅加达；印尼语
n. 执行时间，运行时间

eg2: But, except for their  impacts, he added, the squid pose no threat to people.
但是，他补充说，除了生态影响，这些乌贼对人类没有造成威胁。
balance would be broken by the fact that rabbits overabound on the grasslands.
草原上过度繁殖的野兔对草原的破坏将导致生态平衡的失控。
At the same time, farming drives much of the  damage humans do: from habitat loss (and decreasing biodiversity) to messing around with the cycle of nitrogen through the environment.
与此同时，农业驱动人类对生态环境进行了诸多破坏：从栖息地丧失（和生物多样性减少）到使环境氮循环日渐混乱。

ex: n. 牧群；兽群；人群；芸芸众生
v. （使）向…移动；牧放（牲畜、兽群）
网络 牛群；放牧；畜群
eg2: a herd of cows/deer/elephants
一群牛╱鹿╱象
a beef/dairy herd
肉牛群；奶牛群
She pushed her way through a herd of lunchtime drinkers.
她从一群午餐时饮酒的人中间挤了过去。
the common herd(= ordinary people)
普通百姓
Why follow the herd(= do and think the same as everyone else) ?
为什么随大溜呢？
We all herded on to the bus.
我们全都拥上了公共汽车。
They were herded together into trucks and driven away.
他们被一起赶上卡车拉走了。
a shepherd herding his flock
正在放羊的羊倌

ex: n. 焖罐（内装炖的肉、土豆、洋葱等）；小电热锅（可烧水或热饭）
网络 火锅；陆陆鸡煲火锅；重庆火锅
n. （国家或机构的）基础设施
网络 基础建设；基础结构；基础架构
adj. 辛辣的；香的，多香料的；下流的

wp.Spicy Cuttlefish: 拌八爪鱼;拌章鱼;拌㈧爪鱼
wp.Spicy Crawdad: 香辣龙虾;喷鼻辣龙虾;辛辣喇蛄肉;食谱香辣龙虾
wp.spicy chicken: 辣子鸡;歌乐山辣子鸡;锅巴辣子鸡;辣子鸡丁

eg2: It is also India’s only state with a Muslim majority, and  kebabs and lamb dishes are its signature.
这里是印度唯一的穆斯林占大多数人口的邦，香烤羊肉串和羔羊肉是这里的特色。
Some flavors, such as spicy and sour, require practice to enjoy, and our tongues are highly sensitive to these tastes.
一些味道，例如辛辣和酸，需要经过练习方能懂得享受，而且我们的舌头对这些味道极为敏感。
FOODS:- Most spicy foods have a mild thermogenic effect which means that they can help activate your body’s fat burning process.
辛辣食物：多数辛辣食物有轻微的产生热量的效果，这意味着它们能激活你身体的脂肪燃烧过程。

wp.Unicorn blood: 独角兽之血;洗血独角兽

eg2: When the unicorn saw the number stuck to my side, it started bouncing up and down in excitement.
当这只独角兽看见贴在我侧面的数字时，它开始兴奋地跳上跳下。
Opening image: A glorious well-oiled angel riding on a winged . Sure, it's sexy. But too sexy?
开场图片：一个辉煌的醉酒天使骑在长翅膀的独角兽上。当然，它性感。但是很性感么？
Opening image: A glorious well-oiled angel riding on a winged .
开场图片：一个辉煌的醉酒天使骑在长翅膀的独角兽上。

Title: Indonesia’s election, and more from our daily podcast
